title: Brevan Howard Bangalore | Offer | oct 2024
content:
Education: Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 3.5
Date of the Offer: Oct, 2024
Current Org: MNC (Investment Bank)
Current TC: 25L
Company: Brevan Howard
Title/Level: Python Developer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 50L
Stock Bonus: $70K (4 years, 25%)
Performance Bonus: 10L
Joining Bonus: 5L
Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~80L (1st Year)

**Inverview Experience:**

**Round 1 (DSA, 1.5 hours):**

Two medium DSA problems:
* Print all permutations of a string.
* Print all subsequences and permutations of a string.
* 30-minute discussion on my previous work.

**Round 2 (Techno-Managerial, 30 min):**

* Discussion on my previous work.
* A few finance-related questions.
* LRU cache design (conceptual, no coding).

**Round 3 (Technical, 40 min):**

* AWS and Python-related questions.
* One system design question.

**Round 4 (Tech, 30 min):**

* Discussion on tech stack.
* One design question and a math puzzle (couldn't solve).
